@roblox/globaltype/ImageButton.ImageRect.documentation: El desplazamiento en píxeles de la subárea de una imagen que se va a mostrar.
@roblox/globaltype/ImageButton.ImageRect.code_sample:
-- Place this in an ImageLabel/ImageButton with size 256x256
local imageLabel = script.Parent

-- The following image is 1024x1024 with 12 frames (256x256)
-- The frames play an animation of a man throwing a punch
imageLabel.Image = "rbxassetid://848623155"
imageLabel.ImageRectSize = Vector2.new(256, 256)

-- The order of the frames to be displayed (left-to-right, then top-to-bottom)
local frames = {
	Vector2.new(0, 0); Vector2.new(1, 0); Vector2.new(2, 0); Vector2.new(3, 0);
	Vector2.new(0, 1); Vector2.new(1, 1); Vector2.new(2, 1); Vector2.new(3, 1);
	Vector2.new(0, 2); Vector2.new(1, 2); Vector2.new(2, 2); Vector2.new(3, 2);
}

-- Animate the frames one at a time in a loop
while true do
	for i = 1, #frames do
		imageLabel.ImageRectOffset = frames[i] * imageLabel.ImageRectSize
		wait(.1)
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Archivable.documentation: Determines if an Instance can be cloned using Instance:Clone or saved to file.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.ClassName.documentation: A read-only string representing the class this Instance belongs to

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Parent.documentation: Determines the hierarchical parent of the Instance

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.RobloxLocked.documentation: A deprecated property that used to protect CoreGui objects

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.DataCost.documentation: The cost of saving the instance using data persistence.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.ClearAllChil.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.
This function destroys all of an Instance's children.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.ClearAllChil.code_sample:
local part = Instance.new("Part")

-- add some sparkles
for i = 1, 3 do
  Instance.new("Sparkles", part)
end

print("Part has " .. #part:GetChildren() .. " children")
--> Part has 3 children

part:ClearAllChildren()

print("Part has " .. #part:GetChildren() .. " children")
--> Part has 0 children

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Clone/param/.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Clone.documentation: Create a copy of an object and all its descendants, ignoring objects that are not Instance.Archivable
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Clone.code_sample:
-- Get a reference to an existing object
    local original = workspace.Model
    -- Create the model copy
    local copy = original:Clone()
    -- Parent the copy to the same parent as the original
    copy.Parent = original.Parent
    -- Move the copy so it's not overlapping the original
    copy:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(CFrame.new(0, 50, 0))

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Destroy/para.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Destroy.documentation: Sets the Instance.Parent property to nil, locks the Instance.Parent property, disconnects all connections and calls Destroy on all children.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Destroy.code_sample:
local Part = Workspace.Part
Part:Destroy()
Part.Parent = Workspace --> The Parent property of Part is locked

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.FindFirstAnc.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.
Returns the first ancestor of the Instance whose Instance.Name is equal to the given name.
Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.
Returns the first ancestor of the Instance whose Instance.ClassName is equal to the given className.
Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.
Returns the first ancestor of the Instance for whom Instance:IsA returns true for the given className.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.FindFirstChi.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.
Whether or not the search should be conducted recursively.
Returns the first child of the Instance found with the given name.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.FindFirstChi.code_sample:
local found = workspace:FindFirstChild("Brick")
if found then 
  found.Name = "Foo"
end

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.FindFirstChi.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.
Returns the first child of the Instance whose Instance.ClassName is equal to the given className.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.FindFirstChi.code_sample:
local player = game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer
local character = player.Character or player.CharacterAdded:wait()
local humanoid
while not humanoid do
    humanoid = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
    if not humanoid then
        character.ChildAdded:wait()
    end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetChildren/.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetChildren.documentation: Returns an array containing all of the Instance's children.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetChildren.code_sample:

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetDebugId/p.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetDebugId.documentation: Returns a coded string of the Instances DebugId used internally by Roblox.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetDescendan.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.
Returns an array containing all of the descendants of the instance
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetDescendan.code_sample:
local descendants = game.Workspace:GetDescendants()

-- Loop through all of the descendants of the Workspace. If a
-- BasePart is found, the code changes that parts color to green
for index, descendant in pairs(descendants) do
	if descendant:IsA("BasePart") then
		descendant.BrickColor = BrickColor.Green()
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetFullName/.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetFullName.documentation: Returns a string describing the Instance's ancestry.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetFullName.code_sample:
-- Create a simple hierarchy
local model = Instance.new("Model")
local part = Instance.new("Part", model)
local fire = Instance.new("Fire", part)
print(fire:GetFullName()) --> Model.Part.Fire
model.Parent = workspace
print(fire:GetFullName()) --> Workspace.Model.Part.Fire
part.Name = "Hello, world"
print(fire:GetFullName()) --> Workspace.Model.Hello, world.Fire

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetPropertyC.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.
Get an event that fires when a given property of an object changes.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetPropertyC.code_sample:
local part = Instance.new("Part")

-- Save the current state
local currentColor = part.BrickColor

local function onBrickColorChanged()
	local newColor = part.BrickColor
	print("Color changed from " .. currentColor.Name .. " to " .. newColor.Name)
	currentColor = newColor
end 
part:GetPropertyChangedSignal("BrickColor"):Connect(onBrickColorChanged)

-- Make some changes
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really red")
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really blue")

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsA/param/0.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsA/param/1.documentation: The class against which the Instance's class will be checked. Case-sensitive.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsA/return/0.documentation: Describes whether the Instance's class matched or is a subclass of the given class

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsA.documentation: Returns true if an Instance's class matches or inherits from a given class
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsA.code_sample:
print(Workspace:IsA("Instance" )) --> true
print(Workspace:IsA("Workspace")) --> true
print(game:IsA("Workspace")) --> false
print(game:IsA("DataModel")) --> true

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsAncestorOf.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.
True if the Instance is an ancestor of the given descendant.
Returns true if an Instance is an ancestor of the given descendant.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsDescendant.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.
True if the Instance is a descendant of the given ancestor.
Returns true if an Instance is a descendant of the given ancestor.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsDescendant.code_sample:
local part = Instance.new("Part")
print(part:IsDescendantOf(game))
--> false

part.Parent = game.Workspace
print(part:IsDescendantOf(game))
--> true

part.Parent = game
print(part:IsDescendantOf(game))
--> true

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Remove/param.documentation: Instance is the base class for all classes in the Roblox class hierarchy.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Remove.documentation: Sets the object's Parent to nil, and does the same for all its descendants.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Remove.code_sample:

--> nil

--> Workspace

Conecta la función dada al evento y devuelve un RBXScriptConnection que lo representa.

Genera el hilo actual hasta que la señal se active y devuelva los argumentos
proporcionada por la señal.
Fires when the Instance.Parent property of the object or one of its ancestors is changed.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.AncestryChan.code_sample:
local p = Instance.new("Part")
p.Parent = game.Workspace
p.AncestryChanged:Connect(function(child, parent)
    print(child.Name.." is now a child of "..parent.Name)
end)
p.Parent = Workspace.Model

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Changed.documentation: Fired immediately after a property of an object changes.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Changed.code_sample:
-- Demonstrate the Changed event by creating a Part
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Changed:Connect(print)
-- This fires Changed with "Transparency"
part.Transparency = .5
-- Similarly, this fires Changed with "Number"
part.Name = "SomePart"
-- Since changing BrickColor will also change other
-- properties at the same time, this line fires Changed
-- with "BrickColor", "Color3" and "Color3uint16".
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.Red()

-- A NumberValue holds a double-precision floating-point number 
local vNumber = Instance.new("NumberValue")
vNumber.Changed:Connect(print)
-- This fires Changed with 123.456 (not "Value")
vNumber.Value = 123.456
-- This does not fire Changed
vNumber.Name = "SomeNumber"

-- A StringValue stores one string
local vString = Instance.new("StringValue")
vString.Changed:Connect(print)
-- This fires Changed with "Hello" (not "Value")
vString.Value = "Hello"

@roblox/globaltype/IntValue.documentation: A container object for a single integer.
@roblox/globaltype/IntValue.code_sample:
-- These are the constraints for a 32-bit signed integer
local INT_MAX = 2 ^ 31 - 1
local INT_MIN = -(2 ^ 31)

local vInteger = Instance.new("IntValue")
vInteger.Changed:Connect(print)
-- Some small values
vInteger.Value = 5
vInteger.Value = 0
vInteger.Value = -0 -- No change - same as 0
-- Min value
vInteger.Value = INT_MIN
-- Max value
vInteger.Value = INT_MAX
-- Max value plus one; this causes integer overflow!
-- The IntValue changes to INT_MIN!
vInteger.Value = INT_MAX + 1

@roblox/globaltype/JointInstance.documentation: JointInstance is the base class for joints, such as Connectors, Welds, and Snaps.

@roblox/globaltype/JointInstance.Active.documentation: Determines if the joint is currently active in the world

@roblox/globaltype/JointInstance.C0.documentation: Determines how the offset point is attached to JointInstance.Part0.

@roblox/globaltype/JointInstance.C1.documentation: Is subtracted from the JointInstance.C0 property to create an offset point for JointInstance.Part1.

@roblox/globaltype/JointInstance.Enabled.documentation: Sets whether the joint is active or not

@roblox/globaltype/JointInstance.Part0.documentation: The first BasePart that the joint connects.

@roblox/globaltype/JointInstance.Part1.documentation: The second BasePart that the joint connects.

@roblox/globaltype/JointsService.documentation: A service that stores joints created by surface connections

@roblox/globaltype/JointsService.ClearJo.documentation: A service that stores joints created by surface connections
Will remove any 'create joints' that were made visible via the JointsService:ShowPermissibleJoints method.

@roblox/globaltype/JointsService.CreateJ.documentation: A service that stores joints created by surface connections
Updates all visible joints for the parts assigned by the JointsService:SetJoinAfterMoveTarget and JointsService:SetJoinAfterMoveInstance methods.

@roblox/globaltype/JointsService.SetJoin.documentation: A service that stores joints created by surface connections
Sets the PVInstance that will be connected with the target PVInstance specified by SetJoinAfterMoveTarget.
A service that stores joints created by surface connections
Sets the PVInstance that will be connected with the PVInstance specified by SetJoinAfterMoveInstance.

@roblox/globaltype/JointsService.ShowPer.documentation: A service that stores joints created by surface connections
When used it will visibly display a potential surface connection between the two BasePart, which were set with JointsService:SetJoinAfterMoveTarget and JointsService:SetJoinAfterMoveInstance.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.Time.documentation: This property gives the Keyframe's time position (in seconds) in an animation. This determines the time at which the Poses inside the keyframe will be shown.
@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.Time.code_sample:
local function getSequenceLength(keyframeSequence)
	local length = 0
	for _, keyframe in pairs(keyframeSequence:GetKeyframes()) do 
		if keyframe.Time > length then 
			length = keyframe.Time 
		end
	end
	return length
end

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.AddMarker/pa.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.AddMarker.documentation: Adds a KeyframeMarker to the Keyframe by parenting it to the keyframe
@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.AddMarker.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)
local marker = Instance.new("KeyframeMarker")
marker.Name = "FootStep"
marker.Value = 100

keyframe:AddMarker(marker) --marker.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

keyframe:RemoveMarker(marker) --marker.Parent = nil

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.AddPose/para.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.AddPose.documentation: This function adds a Pose to the Keyframe by parenting it to the keyframe.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetMarkers/p.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetMarkers/r.documentation: An array containing all KeyframeMarker that have been added to the `Keyframe

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetMarkers.documentation: Returns an array containing all KeyframeMarkers that have been added to the Keyframe
@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetMarkers.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)

local marker1 = Instance.new("KeyframeMarker")
marker1.Name = "FootStep"
marker1.Value = 100

local marker2 = Instance.new("KeyframeMarker")
marker2.Name = "Wave"
marker3.Value = 100

keyframe:AddMarker(marker1) --marker.Parent = keyframe
keyframe:AddMarker(marker2) --marker.Parent = keyframe

local markers = keyframe:GetMarkers()
for _, marker in pairs (markers) do
	print(marker.Name)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetPoses/par.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetPoses.documentation: This function returns an array containing all Poses that have been added to a Keyframe
@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetPoses.code_sample:
local function resetPoses(parent)
    	-- both functions are equivalent to GetChildren
    	local poses = parent:IsA("Keyframe") and parent:GetPoses() 
    		or parent:IsA("Pose") and parent:GetSubPoses()
    
    	for _, pose in pairs(poses) do 
    		if pose:IsA("Pose") then
    			pose.CFrame = CFrame.new()
    			-- recurse
    			resetPoses(pose)
    		end
    	end
    end

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.RemoveMarker.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.
The marker being removed from the Keyframe
Removes a KeyframeMarker from the Keyframeby settings its Instance.Parent to nil
@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.RemoveMarker.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)
local marker = Instance.new("KeyframeMarker")
marker.Name = "FootStep"
marker.Value = 100

keyframe:AddMarker(marker) --marker.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

keyframe:RemoveMarker(marker) --marker.Parent = nil

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.RemovePose/p.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.RemovePose.documentation: This function removes a Pose from the Keyframe by setting its Instance.Parent to nil.
@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.RemovePose.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)

local pose = Instance.new("Pose")
pose.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out
local pose2 = Instance.new("Pose")
pose2.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose2.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

keyframe:RemovePose(pose) -- pose.Parent = nil 

wait(2)

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

pose:AddSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = pose

wait(2)

pose:RemoveSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = nil

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeMarker.documentation: An instance meant to represent an event that will eventually be fired when a Keyframe is hit
@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeMarker.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)

local marker1 = Instance.new("KeyframeMarker")
marker1.Name = "FootStep"
marker1.Value = 100

local marker2 = Instance.new("KeyframeMarker")
marker2.Name = "Wave"
marker3.Value = 100

keyframe:AddMarker(marker1) --marker.Parent = keyframe
keyframe:AddMarker(marker2) --marker.Parent = keyframe

local markers = keyframe:GetMarkers()
for _, marker in pairs (markers) do
	print(marker.Name)
end

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.documentation: This object stores all of the Keyframes for an animation and other data about the animation. It is the object that is created by the Roblox Animation Editor and uploaded to Roblox.
@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.code_sample:
local function getSequenceLength(keyframeSequence)
	local length = 0
	for _, keyframe in pairs(keyframeSequence:GetKeyframes()) do 
		if keyframe.Time > length then 
			length = keyframe.Time 
		end
	end
	return length
end

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.Auth.documentation: Contains the hip height of the Humanoid of the model that was used to author this KeyframeSequence

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.AddK.documentation: This object stores all of the Keyframes for an animation and other data about the animation. It is the object that is created by the Roblox Animation Editor and uploaded to Roblox.
This function adds a Keyframe to the KeyframeSequence by parenting it to the KeyframeSequence.
@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.AddK.code_sample:
-- create the keyframesequence
local keyframeSequence = Instance.new("KeyframeSequence")
keyframeSequence.Loop = false
keyframeSequence.Priority = Enum.AnimationPriority.Action

--  create a keyframe
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe")
keyframe.Time = 0

-- create sample poses
local rootPose = Instance.new("Pose")
rootPose.Name = "HumanoidRootPart"
rootPose.Weight = 0

local lowerTorsoPose = Instance.new("Pose")
lowerTorsoPose.Name = "LowerTorso"
lowerTorsoPose.Weight = 1

-- set the sequence hierarchy
rootPose:AddSubPose(lowerTorsoPose) -- lowerTorsoPose.Parent = rootPose
keyframe:AddPose(rootPose) -- rootPose.Parent = keyframe
keyframeSequence:AddKeyframe(keyframe) -- keyframe.Parent = keyframeSequence

-- parent the sequence 
keyframeSequence.Parent = workspace

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.GetK.documentation: This object stores all of the Keyframes for an animation and other data about the animation. It is the object that is created by the Roblox Animation Editor and uploaded to Roblox.
Returns an array that contains all Keyframes that have been added to a KeyframeSequence.
@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.GetK.code_sample:
local function getSequenceLength(keyframeSequence)
	local length = 0
	for _, keyframe in pairs(keyframeSequence:GetKeyframes()) do 
		if keyframe.Time > length then 
			length = keyframe.Time 
		end
	end
	return length
end

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.Remo.documentation: This object stores all of the Keyframes for an animation and other data about the animation. It is the object that is created by the Roblox Animation Editor and uploaded to Roblox.
This function removes a Keyframe from the KeyframeSequence by setting its parent to nil.
@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.Remo.code_sample:
-- create the keyframesequence
local keyframeSequence = Instance.new("KeyframeSequence")
keyframeSequence.Parent = workspace 

-- create a keyframe
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe")

-- add the keyframe 
keyframeSequence:AddKeyframe(keyframe)

wait(2)

-- remove the keyframe 
keyframeSequence:AddKeyframe(keyframe)

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequenceProvi.documentation: The KeyframeSequenceProvider is a service that is used to load and preview KeyframeSequences. It includes a number of functions that are useful when working with Animations.
The KeyframeSequenceProvider is a service that is used to load and preview KeyframeSequences. It includes a number of functions that are useful when working with Animations.
The KeyframeSequence to be used.
A temporary asset ID generated for localized animation playback.
Generates a temporary asset ID from a KeyframeSequence that can be used for localized testing of an animation. Generates an active:// URL.
The KeyframeSequenceProvider is a service that is used to load and preview KeyframeSequences. It includes a number of functions that are useful when working with Animations.
The KeyframeSequence to be used.
A temporary asset ID generated for localized animation playback.
Generates a temporary asset ID from a KeyframeSequence that can be used for localized testing of an animation. Generates a hash.
The KeyframeSequenceProvider is a service that is used to load and preview KeyframeSequences. It includes a number of functions that are useful when working with Animations.
The user ID of the user.
An InventoryPages of animations.
This function returns an InventoryPages object which can be used to iterate over animations owned by a specific user.
@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequenceProvi.code_sample:
local KeyframeSequenceProvider = game:GetService("KeyframeSequenceProvider")

local USER_ID = 0 -- Insert your UserId here

local function extractPages(pagesObject)
    local array = {}
    while true do 
        local thisPage = pagesObject:GetCurrentPage()
        for _, v in pairs(thisPage) do 
            table.insert(array, v)
        end
        if pagesObject.IsFinished then
            break 
        end 
        pagesObject:AdvanceToNextPageAsync()
    end
    return array
end

local inventoryPages = KeyframeSequenceProvider:GetAnimations(USER_ID)

local animationIds = extractPages(inventoryPages)

for _, id in pairs(animationIds) do 
    print(id)
end
print("total: ", #animationIds)

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequenceProvi.documentation: The KeyframeSequenceProvider is a service that is used to load and preview KeyframeSequences. It includes a number of functions that are useful when working with Animations.
The content ID of the animation.
The KeyframeSequence found.
Returns a KeyframeSequence based on the specified assetId asynchronously.
@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequenceProvi.code_sample:
local KeyframeSequence = game:GetService("KeyframeSequenceProvider")
local animation = "rbxassetid://507771019"
local keyframes = {}
local success = pcall(function()
	keyframes = KeyframeSequence:GetKeyframeSequenceAsync(animation)
end)
if success then
	local keyframeTable = keyframes:GetKeyframes()
	for key,value in ipairs(keyframeTable) do
		print("The time of keyframe number",key,"is",value.Time)
	end
else
	print("error getting KeyframeSequence")
end

@roblox/globaltype/Light.documentation: Lightes una clase raíz para objetos relacionados con la iluminación dinámica.

@roblox/globaltype/Light.Brightness.documentation: Establece el brillo de la luz emitida, por defecto es 1.

@roblox/globaltype/Light.Color.documentation: El color de la luz emitida.

@roblox/globaltype/Light.Enabled.documentation: Si se establece en true, se emitirá luz desde el objeto fuente.

@roblox/globaltype/Light.Shadows.documentation: Si se establece en true, proyectará sombras si un obstáculo bloquea la luz.

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.documentation: The Lighting service controls the environmental lighting in a game. It includes a range of adjustable properties that can be used to change how lighting appears and interacts with other objects.
@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.code_sample:
local Lighting = game:GetService("Lighting")

-- constants
local TIME_SPEED = 60 -- 1 min = 1 hour
local START_TIME = 9 -- 9am
--

local minutesAfterMidnight = START_TIME * 60
local waitTime = 60 / TIME_SPEED

while true do
	minutesAfterMidnight = minutesAfterMidnight + 1

	Lighting:SetMinutesAfterMidnight(minutesAfterMidnight)

	wait(waitTime)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.Ambient.documentation: The lighting hue applied to areas that are occluded from the sky, such as indoor areas

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.Brightness.documentation: The intensity of illumination in the place.

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.ClockTime.documentation: A numerical representation (in hours) of the current time of day used by Lighting.

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.ColorShift_B.documentation: The hue represented in light reflected in the opposite surfaces to those facing the sun or moon.

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.ColorShift_T.documentation: The hue represented in light reflected from surfaces facing the sun or moon.

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.EnvironmentD.documentation: Ambient light that is derived from the environment

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.FogColor.documentation: A DataType.Color3 value giving the hue of Lighting's fog.

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.FogEnd.documentation: The depth from the Workspace.CurrentCamera, in studs, at which fog will be completely opaque.

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.FogStart.documentation: The depth from the Workspace.CurrentCamera, in studs, at which fog begins to show.

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.GeographicLa.documentation: The geographic latitude, in degrees, of the scene, influencing the result of Lightings time on the position of the sun and moon.

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.GlobalShadow.documentation: Toggles voxel-based dynamic lighting for the game

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.OutdoorAmbie.documentation: The lighting hue applied to outdoor areas.

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.ShadowSoftne.documentation: Controls how blurry the shadows are

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.Technology.documentation: A temporary non-scriptable property that determines the lighting system used to render the 3D world (e.g. legacy, Future Is Bright, shadow map).

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.TimeOfDay.documentation: A 24 hour string representation of the current time of day used by Lighting.

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.Outlines.documentation: Determines whether outlines are enabled or disabled in a place

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.ShadowColor.documentation: This is supposed to change the color of player shadows, but currently doesn't do anything.

@roblox/globaltype/LinearVelocity.documentation: Applies force on a part/assembly to maintain a linear velocity.

@roblox/globaltype/LineForce.documentation: Restricción que se utiliza para aplicar una fuerza a lo largo de una línea entre dos puntos.

@roblox/globaltype/LineForce.ApplyAtCent.documentation:
Si se establece en false, la fuerza se aplicará a la pieza en el
Ubicación del archivo adjunto 0. Esto significa que si el archivo adjunto no está en el
centro de la pieza, puede crear un par en la pieza.

@roblox/globaltype/LineForce.InverseSqua.documentation:
Si es verdadero, la magnitud de la fuerza se multiplica por el cuadrado inverso del
distancia.

@roblox/globaltype/LineForce.ReactionFor.documentation: Habilita una fuerza de reacción igual y opuesta en el padre de Attachment1.

@roblox/globaltype/LocalizationService.G.code_sample:
local LocalizationService = game:GetService("LocalizationService")
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer

local result, code = pcall(function()
	return LocalizationService:GetCountryRegionForPlayerAsync(player)
end)

if result and code == "CA" then
	print("Hello, friend from Canada!")
else
	print("GetCountryRegionForPlayerAsync failed: " .. code)
end

@roblox/globaltype/LocalizationService.G.documentation: Handlestraducción automática.
Lenguaje olocale código admitido por Roblox.
The Translator instance for the specified locale.

Rende hasta que la nube LocalizationTable para el argumentolocale tenga se ha cargado, si está disponible. Devuelve una instancia Translator que se utilizará para traducciones para lo proporcionadolocale.
@roblox/globaltype/LocalizationService.G.code_sample:
local LS = game:GetService('LocalizationService')

local res,trans = pcall(function()
	return LS:GetTranslatorForLocaleAsync("fr")
end)
	
if res then
	local ctx = game.Workspace.Sign.SurfaceGui.Frame.TextLabel
	local res = trans:Translate(ctx, "Hello World!")
	print('Hello in French: ' .. res)
else
	print('GetTranslatorForLocaleAsync failed: ' .. trans)
end

@roblox/globaltype/MarketplaceService.Pr.documentation:
SereceiptInfo trata de una tabla con las siguientes claves:
  • playerID (número): el seudónimo del jugador que realizó la compra
  • placeIdWherePurchased (número): el identificador del lugar en el que se realiza una compra se hizo
  • PurchaseId (string): Un identificador único para una compra que debe para evitar la concesión de un producto varias veces
  • ProductId (number): El número de identificación del producto comprado
  • currencyType (enum.currencyType): Obsoleto. El tipo de moneda utilizado en la transacción.
  • currencySpent (number): La cantidad de moneda gastada en el transacción.

An enum representing in what manner the developer product receipt was processed:
  • PurchaseGranted indicates that the game successfully granted the player the benefit the developer product is meant to provide, such as a currency boost, gameplay bonus, item, etc. This indicates to Roblox that the sale was performed successfully. Do not return PurchaseGranted if the product could not be granted.
  • NotProcessedYet indicates the developer product's benefit could not be granted, such as a product the player is not eligible to purchase, is no longer relevant to the current game state, etc.
Acallback para procesar recibos de compras de productos.

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.documentation: Provides access to a queue within MemoryStore.

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.AddA.documentation: Provides access to a queue within MemoryStore.
The value of the item to add to the queue.
Item expiration time, in seconds, after which the item will be automatically removed from the queue.
Item priority. Items with higher priority are retrieved from the queue before items with lower priority.
Adds an item to the queue.

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.Read.documentation: Provides access to a queue within MemoryStore.
Number of items to read. The maximum allowed value of this parameter is 100.

Controls the behavior of the method in the case the queue has fewer than count items: if set to false the method returns all available items; if set to true, it returns no items. The default value is false.

The duration, in seconds, for which the method will wait if the required number of items is not immediately available in the queue. This parameter can be set to zero to indicate no wait. If this parameter is not provided or set to -1, the method will wait indefinitely.

A tuple of two elements. The first element is an array of item values read from the queue. The second element is a string identifier that should be passed to MemoryStoreQueue:RemoveAsync to permanently remove these items from the queue.
Reads one or more items from the queue.
@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.Read.code_sample:
-- obtain necessary services and instances
local UMS = game:GetService("MemoryStoreService")
local DSS = game:GetService(“DataStoreService”)
local queue = UMS:GetQueue("PlayerQueue")
local ds = DSS:GetDataStore(“PlayerStore”)

-- main processing loop
while true do
    pcall(function()
        -- wait for an item to process
        local items, id = queue:ReadAsync(1, false, 30)

        -- check if an item was retrieved
        if #items > 0 then
            -- mark the item as processed
            ds:UpdateAsync(items[0], function(data)
                data = data or {}
                data.processed = 1
                return data
            end)

            -- remove the item from the queue
            queue:RemoveAsync(id)
        end
    end)
end

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.Remo.documentation: Provides access to a queue within MemoryStore.
Identifies the items to delete. Use the value returned by MemoryStoreQueue:ReadAsync.
Removes an item or items previously read from the queue.
@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.Remo.code_sample:
-- obtain necessary services and instances
local UMS = game:GetService("MemoryStoreService")
local DSS = game:GetService(“DataStoreService”)
local queue = UMS:GetQueue("PlayerQueue")
local ds = DSS:GetDataStore(“PlayerStore”)

-- main processing loop
while true do
    pcall(function()
        -- wait for an item to process
        local items, id = queue:ReadAsync(1, false, 30)

        -- check if an item was retrieved
        if #items > 0 then
            -- mark the item as processed
            ds:UpdateAsync(items[0], function(data)
                data = data or {}
                data.processed = 1
                return data
            end)

            -- remove the item from the queue
            queue:RemoveAsync(id)
        end
    end)
end

Key whose value to retrieve.

Sort direction, ascending or descending.

(Optional) Lower bound, exclusive, for the returned keys.
(Optional) Upper bound, exclusive, for the returned keys.

Provides access to a sorted map within MemoryStore.
Key whose value to set.
Key value to set.
Item expiration, in seconds. The item is automatically removed from the sorted map once the expiration duration is reached. The maximum expiration time is 30 days (2,592,000 seconds).
True if a new item was added, false -- if an existing item was updated.
Sets the value of a key.
Provides access to a sorted map within MemoryStore.
Key whose value to update.
A function which you need to provide. The function takes the key’s old value as input and returns the new value.
Item expiration time, in seconds, after which the item will be automatically removed from the sorted map. The maximum expiration time is 30 days (2,592,000 seconds).
The return value is the last value returned by the transform function.
Retrieves the value of a key from a sorted map and updates it with a new value.
@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreSortedMap..code_sample:
local UMS = game:GetService(“MemoryStoreService”)
local map = UMS:GetSortedMap(“AuctionItems”)

function PlaceBid(itemKey, bidAmount)
    map:UpdateAsync(itemKey, function (item)
        item = item or { highestBid = 0 }
        if item.highestBid < bidAmount then
            item.highestBid = bidAmount
            return item
        end
        return nil
    end)
end

@roblox/globaltype/MessagingService.Publ.documentation: MessagingService allows game servers in the same game to communicate with each other
Determines where the message is sent
The data to include in the message
Invokes the supplied callback whenever a message is pushed to the topic

@roblox/globaltype/MessagingService.Subs.documentation: MessagingService allows game servers in the same game to communicate with each other
Determines where to listen for messages
Function to be invoked whenever a message is received
Connection that can be used to unsubscribe from the topic
Begins listening to the given topic
@roblox/globaltype/MessagingService.Subs.code_sample:
local messagingService = game:getService("MessagingService")
local players = game:GetService("Players")
 
players.PlayerAdded:connect(function(player)
    --subscribe to the topic
    local topic = "player-" .. player.UserId
    local connection = messagingService:SubscribeAsync(topic, function(message)
        print("Received message for " .. player.Name)
    end)
 
    player.AncestryChanged:connect(function()
        -- unsubscribe from the topic
        connection:Disconnect()
    end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Model.documentation: Los modelos son objetos contenedores, lo que significa que agrupan objetos. Son se usa mejor para almacenar colecciones de BasePart y tener un número de funciones que amplían su funcionalidad.
@roblox/globaltype/Model.code_sample:
local function groupObjects(objectTable)
	local model = Instance.new("Model")
	for _, object in pairs(objectTable) do
		object.Parent = model
	end
	return model
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(newPlayer)
	newPlayer.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(characterModel)

		characterModel:BreakJoints()
	end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetPrimaryPartC.documentation: Los modelos son objetos contenedores, lo que significa que agrupan objetos. Son se usa mejor para almacenar colecciones de BasePart y tener un número de funciones que amplían su funcionalidad.
Devuelve el cFrame de Model's Model.PrimaryPart. Estofunction arrojará un error si nopart existe ningún primario para Model.
@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetPrimaryPartC.code_sample:
local startPosition = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)

-- create a simple rotated model at the startPosition
local model = Instance.new("Model", game.Workspace)

local part1 = Instance.new("Part")
part1.Size = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)
part1.CFrame = CFrame.new(startPosition)
part1.Anchored = true
part1.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright yellow")
part1.Parent = model

local part2 = Instance.new("Part")
part2.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
part2.CFrame = part1.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 3, 0)
part2.Anchored = true
part2.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue")
part2.Parent = model

-- set the primary part
model.PrimaryPart = part1
model.Parent = game.Workspace

while true do
	local primaryPartCFrame = model:GetPrimaryPartCFrame()
	local newCFrame = primaryPartCFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(10), 0)
	model:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(newCFrame)
	wait(.2)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Model.MakeJoints.documentation: Repasa todos los BaseParts en el Model. Si algunopart de los lados tiene un SurfaceType que puede hacer una unión, creará una unión con cualquier partes.

@roblox/globaltype/ModuleScript.documentation: Un tipo de objeto script que se ejecuta una vez cuando se llama a require con él. Devuelve exactamente un valor, normalmente una tabla de funciones, para que lo usen otros guiones. Es útil para compartimentar el código.
@roblox/globaltype/ModuleScript.code_sample:
-- Tables are store multiple values in one variable
    local my_functions = {}
    
    -- Add a few functions to the table
    function my_functions.foo()
    	print("Foo!")
    end
    
    function functions.bar()
    	print("Bar!")
    end
    
    -- ModuleScripts must return exactly one value
    return my_functions

@roblox/globaltype/ModuleScript.LinkedSo.documentation: Se utiliza para almacenar una URL que apunta a una fuente de script en línea. Enlaza el código en línea al Script.Source del script.

@roblox/globaltype/ModuleScript.Source.documentation: El código que se va a ejecutar.

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Origin.documentation: A DataType.CFrame positioned at the Workspace.CurrentCamera and oriented toward the Mouse's 3D position.
@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Origin.code_sample:
local mouse = game.Players.LocalPlayer:GetMouse()
local camPos = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CoordinateFrame.p

print("-------------------------------------------------")
print("Mouse.Hit:\t|",  mouse.hit.p)
print("camPos:\t|", camPos)
print("Mouse.Origin:\t|", mouse.Origin.p)
print("-------------------------------------------------")
print("Magnitude:\t|",(mouse.Origin.p - camPos).magnitude)
print("-------------------------------------------------")

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Target.documentation: The object in 3D space the Mouse is pointing to
@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Target.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local localPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer
local backpack = localPlayer:WaitForChild("Backpack")

local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
tool.RequiresHandle = false
tool.CanBeDropped = false 
tool.Parent = backpack

tool.Equipped:Connect(function(mouse)
	mouse.Button1Down:Connect(function()
		if mouse.Target and mouse.Target.Parent then
			mouse.Target.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random()
		end
	end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.TargetFilter.documentation: Determines an object (and its descendants) to be ignored when determining Mouse.Hit and Mouse.Target

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.TargetSurface.documentation: Indicates the Enum.NormalId of the BasePart surface at which the mouse is pointing

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.UnitRay.documentation: A DataType.Ray directed towards the Mouse's world position, originating from the Workspace.CurrentCamera's world position

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.ViewSizeX.documentation: Describes the width of the game window in pixels
@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.ViewSizeX.code_sample:
-- Note: You should use ContextActionService or UserInputService instead of 
-- the Mouse object for accomplishing this task.
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local mouse = player:GetMouse()

local function onMouseMove()
	-- Construct Vector2 objects for the mouse's position and screen size
	local position = Vector2.new(mouse.X, mouse.Y)
	local size = Vector2.new(mouse.ViewSizeX, mouse.ViewSizeY)
	-- A normalized position will map the top left (just under the topbar)
	-- to (0, 0) the bottom right to (1, 1), and the center to (0.5, 0.5).
	-- This is calculated by dividing the position by the total size.
	local normalizedPosition = position / size
	print(normalizedPosition)
end
mouse.Move:Connect(onMouseMove)

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Move.documentation: Fired when the mouse is moved.
@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Move.code_sample:
local player= game.Players.LocalPlayer
local mouse = player:GetMouse()

local point 
local down

local function selectPart()
 	if mouse.Target and not mouse.Target.Locked then 
		point = mouse.Target
  		mouse.TargetFilter = point
  		down = true
 	end
end

local function movePart()
	if down and point then
  		local posX, posY, posZ = mouse.Hit.X,mouse.Hit.Y,mouse.Hit.Z
  		point.Position = Vector3.new(posX,posY,posZ)
 	end
end

local function deselectPart()
 	down = false
	point = nil
 	mouse.TargetFilter = nil
end

mouse.Button1Down:Connect(selectPart)
mouse.Button1Up:Connect(deselectPart)
mouse.Move:Connect(movePart)

@roblox/globaltype/NumberValue.documentation: Un objeto contenedor para un único número de punto flotante de doble precisión.
@roblox/globaltype/NumberValue.code_sample:
-- Demonstrate the Changed event by creating a Part
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Changed:Connect(print)
-- This fires Changed with "Transparency"
part.Transparency = .5
-- Similarly, this fires Changed with "Number"
part.Name = "SomePart"
-- Since changing BrickColor will also change other
-- properties at the same time, this line fires Changed
-- with "BrickColor", "Color3" and "Color3uint16".
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.Red()

-- A NumberValue holds a double-precision floating-point number 
local vNumber = Instance.new("NumberValue")
vNumber.Changed:Connect(print)
-- This fires Changed with 123.456 (not "Value")
vNumber.Value = 123.456
-- This does not fire Changed
vNumber.Name = "SomeNumber"

-- A StringValue stores one string
local vString = Instance.new("StringValue")
vString.Changed:Connect(print)
-- This fires Changed with "Hello" (not "Value")
vString.Value = "Hello"

@roblox/globaltype/Pants.documentation: Muestra unaPants textura del sitio web de Roblox para mostrarla en un Humanoid aparejo.
@roblox/globaltype/Pants.code_sample:
local function replaceClothes(player)
    	local character = player.Character
    	if character then 
    		-- look for shirts / pants
    		local shirt = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Shirt")
    		local pants = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Pants")
    		-- create shirts / pants if they don't exist
    		if not shirt then 
    			shirt = Instance.new("Shirt", character)
    		end 
    		if not pants then 
    			pants = Instance.new("Pants", character)
     		end
    		-- reset shirt / pants content ids
    		shirt.ShirtTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=83326831"
    		pants.PantsTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=10045638"
    	end
    end

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Locke.documentation: Determines whether the particles rigidly move with the part they're being emitted from.

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Rate.documentation: Determines the number of particles emit per second

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.RotSp.documentation: Determines the range of angular speeds emitted particles, measured in degrees per second

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Rotat.documentation: Determines the range of rotations in degrees for a newly emit particles

local emitter = script.Parent
while true do
	emitter:Clear()
	emitter:Emit(10)
	wait(2)
end

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Emit/.documentation: A special effects object that emits customizable 2D billboard particles into the world
The number of particles to emit

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Emit.documentation: Emits a given number of particles
@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Emit.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local emitter = script.Parent
local part = emitter.Parent

local PARTICLES_PER_STUD = 3

local lastPosition = part.Position
local distance = 0
local function onStep()
	local displacement = part.Position - lastPosition
	distance = distance + displacement.magnitude
	
	local n = math.floor(distance * PARTICLES_PER_STUD)
	emitter:Emit(n)
	distance = distance - n / PARTICLES_PER_STUD
	lastPosition = part.Position
end

RunService.Stepped:Connect(onStep)
emitter.Enabled = false

@roblox/globaltype/Path.GetWaypoints.documentation: Returns an array of points in the path.
@roblox/globaltype/Path.GetWaypoints.code_sample:
local PathfindingService = game:GetService("PathfindingService")

-- Create path object
local path = PathfindingService:CreatePath()

local pathStart = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)
local pathEnd = Vector3.new(100, 1, 25)

-- Compute and check the path
path:ComputeAsync(pathStart, pathEnd)

if path.Status == Enum.PathStatus.Success then
	-- Get path waypoints
	local waypoints = path:GetWaypoints()
	-- Loop through waypoints
	for _, waypoint in pairs(waypoints) do
		-- Output position of waypoint
		print(waypoint.Position)
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.Allow.documentation:
Cuando se establece en true, los objetos simulados físicamente dejarán de simularse

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreAn.documentation: Cuando se establece en true, las partes que son BasePart.anchored mostrarán un gris contorno de superficie en la superficie del cuadro delimitador de la pieza que está que actualmente mira hacia el suelo.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreAs.documentation: Cuando se establece en true, a cada ensamblaje de física se le asigna un color único y el LosPart ` asociados con el ensamblaje están delineados con el color. Piezas que están unidos porJointInstance` compartirán el mismo color.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreAw.documentation:
Cuando se establece en true, las partes que se están simulando físicamente de forma activa
tienen un contorno rojo.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreBo.documentation:
Cuando se establece en true,Part `` se delineará con un color específico, según
en el estado de su cuerpo de simulación raíz.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreCo.documentation: Cuando se establece en true, cada isla de contacto mostrará SelectionBox adornados en las partes de las islas de contacto, donde a cada isla de contacto se le asigna un color aleatorio.

Cuando se establece en true, los adornos de esfera se dibujarán en los puntos de contacto de
cada unopart en el que se producen interacciones físicas.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreJo.documentation: Cuando se establece en true, los ejes XYZ se representan en el BasePart.cFrame de cada part.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreMe.documentation:
Cuando se establece en true, cada mecanismo individual de piezas recibe un
color.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreMo.documentation:
Una propiedad antigua que no funciona correctamente desde finales de 2007. Es
se supone que representa un eje XYZ en la raízpart de unModel ``, pero el eje
el componente de renderizado no funciona correctamente.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreOw.documentation:
Cuando se establece en true, cada personaje de «Jugador» se delinea con un
color, y cada uno de lospart queplayer tiene la propiedad de la red es
delineado con el mismo color.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.ArePa.documentation: Una propiedad antigua que no ha funcionado correctamente desde finales de 2007. Es se supone que representa un eje XYZ grande en el centro de cada BasePart, pero el componente de renderizado de ejes no funciona correctamente.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreRe.documentation: Cuando se establece en true, se dibuja un cilindro alrededor del personaje de cada Jugador, representando su Player.SimulationRadius.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreUn.documentation:
Cuando se establece en true, las partes que no estén alineadas en la cuadrícula de 1x1x1 serán

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreWo.documentation:
Una propiedad antigua que no ha funcionado correctamente desde finales de 2007. Es
se supone que representa un eje XYZ grande en el centro del mundo, pero el
el componente de renderizado de ejes no funciona correctamente.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.Disab.documentation:
Cuando se establece en true, Roblox volverá a usar su solucionador CSG heredado
cuando se realizan operaciones de modelos sólidos.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.IsRec.documentation: Se supone que esta propiedad muestra el basePart.receiveAge de unpart, pero no funciona correctamente.

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.IsTre.documentation:
Cuando se establece en true, las conexiones conjuntas de cada unopart y los estados de

@roblox/globaltype/Player.AutoJumpEnable.documentation: Determines whether the character of a player using a mobile device will automatically jump upon hitting an obstacle.
@roblox/globaltype/Player.AutoJumpEnable.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local button = script.Parent

local function update()
	-- Update button text
	if player.AutoJumpEnabled then
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is ON"
	else
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is OFF"
	end
	-- Reflect the property in the player's character, if they have one
	if player.Character then
		local human = player.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if human then
			human.AutoJumpEnabled = player.AutoJumpEnabled
		end
	end
end

local function onActivated()
	-- Toggle auto-jump
	player.AutoJumpEnabled = not player.AutoJumpEnabled
	-- Update everything else
	update()
end
button.Activated:Connect(onActivated)
update()

@roblox/globaltype/Player.DevEnableMouse.documentation: Determines if the player can toggle mouse lock
@roblox/globaltype/Player.DevEnableMouse.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function toggleMouseLock(player)
	-- Toggle the property
	player.DevEnableMouseLock = not player.DevEnableMouseLock
	-- Display whether the property is true
	if player.DevEnableMouseLock then
		print("Mouse lock is available")
	else
		print("Mouse lock is not available")
	end
end

local function onPlayerChatted(player, message, recipient) 
	if message == "mouselock" then
		toggleMouseLock(player)
	end
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	player.Chatted:Connect(function (...) onPlayerChatted(player, ...) end)
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.FollowUserId.code_sample:
local Players = game.GetService("Players")
local Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local player = Players.LocalPlayer

local function onPlayerAdded(newPlayer)
	if newPlayer.FollowUserId == player.UserId then
		local hint = Instance.new("Hint")
		hint.Parent = player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")
		hint.Text = "You were followed to this game by " .. newPlayer.Name .. "!"
		Debris:AddItem(hint, 3)
	end
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.MaximumSimulat.documentation: The maximum value a Player's Player.SimulationRadius can grow to.
@roblox/globaltype/Player.MaximumSimulat.code_sample:
-- Get the local player
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer

-- Set the maximum simulation radius (default is 1000)
player.MaximumSimulationsRadius = 800

-- Change the simulation radius
local change = -20
while true do
	change = change * -1
	player.SimulationRadius = player.SimulationRadius + change
	wait(5)
end

-- Print the updated simulation radius
player.SimulationRadiusChanged:Connect(function(radius)
	print("The new simulation radius is: "..radius.."studs")
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.ReplicationFoc.code_sample:

@roblox/globaltype/Player.RespawnLocatio.documentation: If set, the player will respawn at the given SpawnLocation

@roblox/globaltype/Player.SimulationRadi.documentation: The simulation radius of a Player's Player.Character.
@roblox/globaltype/Player.SimulationRadi.code_sample:
-- Get the local player
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer

-- Set the maximum simulation radius (default is 1000)
player.MaximumSimulationsRadius = 800

-- Change the simulation radius
local change = -20
while true do
	change = change * -1
	player.SimulationRadius = player.SimulationRadius + change
	wait(5)
end

-- Print the updated simulation radius
player.SimulationRadiusChanged:Connect(function(radius)
	print("The new simulation radius is: "..radius.."studs")
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.GetJoinData.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")

local approvedPlaceIds = {1} -- insert approved PlaceIds here

local function isPlaceIdApproved(placeId)
    for _, id in pairs(approvedPlaceIds) do
        if id == placeId then
            return true
        end
    end
    return false
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
    local joinData = player:GetJoinData()

    -- verify this data was sent by an approved place
    if isPlaceIdApproved(joinData.SourcePlaceId) then

        local teleportData = joinData.TeleportData
        if teleportData then
            local currentLevel = teleportData.currentLevel
            print(player.Name.." is on level "..currentLevel)
        end
    end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacter/.documentation: An object that represents a presently connected client to the game.

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacter.documentation: Creates a new character for the player, removing the old one. Also clears the player's Backpack and PlayerGui
@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacter.code_sample:
local respawnDelay = 5

game.Players.CharacterAutoLoads = false

game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(character)
		-- find the humanoid, and detect when it dies
		local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if humanoid then
			humanoid.Died:Connect(function()
				wait(respawnDelay)
				player:LoadCharacter()
			end)
		end
	end)
	player:LoadCharacter() -- load the character for the first time
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterB.documentation: An object that represents a presently connected client to the game.
Functions similar to Player:LoadCharacter, but the request is processed synchronously instead of asynchronously.

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterW.documentation: An object that represents a presently connected client to the game.
A HumanoidDescription containing traits like body parts/colors, body scaling, accessories, clothing, and animations that will be equipped to the loaded character
Spawns an avatar so it has everything equipped in the passed in HumanoidDescription
@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterW.code_sample:
-- Stop automatic spawning so it can be done in the "PlayerAdded" callback
game.Players.CharacterAutoLoads = false
 
local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- Create a HumanoidDescription
	local humanoidDescription = Instance.new("HumanoidDescription")
	humanoidDescription.HatAccessory = "2551510151,2535600138"
	humanoidDescription.BodyTypeScale = 0.1
	humanoidDescription.ClimbAnimation = 619521311
	humanoidDescription.Face = 86487700
	humanoidDescription.GraphicTShirt = 1711661
	humanoidDescription.HeadColor = Color3.new(0, 1, 0)
	-- Spawn character with the HumanoidDescription
	player:LoadCharacterWithHumanoidDescription(humanoidDescription)
end
 
-- Connect "PlayerAdded" event to "onPlayerAdded()" function
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.RequestStreamA.documentation: An object that represents a presently connected client to the game.
World location where streaming is requested
Requests that the server stream to the player around the specified location
@roblox/globaltype/Player.RequestStreamA.code_sample:
-- Localscript
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local teleportEvent = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("TeleportEvent")
local teleportTarget = CFrame.new(50, 2, 120)
 
-- Fire the remote event
teleportEvent:FireServer(teleportTarget)


-- Server script
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local teleportEvent = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("TeleportEvent")
 
-- Teleport player
local function teleportPlayer(player, teleportTarget)
	-- Request streaming around target location
	player:RequestStreamAroundAsync(teleportTarget.Position)
	-- Teleport character
	player.Character:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(teleportTarget)
end
 
-- Call "teleportPlayer()" when the client fires the remote event
teleportEvent.OnServerEvent:Connect(teleportPlayer)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterA.documentation: An object that represents a presently connected client to the game.
An instance of the asset being loaded, which can be obtained using InsertService's InsertService:LoadAsset function
Places the given instance either in the player's character, head, or StarterGear based on the instance's class.
@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterA.code_sample:
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
    player.Chatted:Connect(function(message)
        local assetId = message:match("id=(%d+)")
        if assetId then
            local model = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(assetId)
            for _, child in pairs(model:GetChildren()) do
                player:LoadCharacterAppearance(child)
            end
        end
    end)
end)

end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(onCharacterAdded)
	player.CharacterRemoving:Connect(onCharacterRemoving)
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.OnTeleport.documentation: Fired when the TeleportState of a player changes.
@roblox/globaltype/Player.OnTeleport.code_sample:
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	local playerOnTeleport = player
	player.OnTeleport:Connect(function(teleportState, placeId, spawnName)
		if teleportState == Enum.TeleportState.Started then
			print("Teleport started ("..playerOnTeleport.Name..")")
		elseif teleportState == Enum.TeleportState.WaitingForServer then
			print("Teleport waiting for server ("..playerOnTeleport.Name..")")
		elseif teleportState == Enum.TeleportState.InProgress then
			print("Teleport in progress ("..playerOnTeleport.Name..")")
		elseif teleportState == Enum.TeleportState.Failed then
			print("Teleport failed! ("..playerOnTeleport.Name..")")
		end
	end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Players.documentation: Un servicio de juegos que contienePlayer objetos conectados actualmente.
@roblox/globaltype/Players.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function onCharacterAdded(character)
	-- Give them sparkles on their head if they don't have them yet
	if not character:FindFirstChild("Sparkles") then
		local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles")
		sparkles.Parent = character:WaitForChild("Head")
	end
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- Check if they already spawned in
	if player.Character then
		onCharacterAdded(player.Character)
	end
	-- Listen for the player (re)spawning 
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(onCharacterAdded)
end

-- Iterate over each player already connected
-- to the game using a generic for-loop
for i, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	onPlayerAdded(player)
end
-- Listen for newly connected players
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

local Players = game.Players

if (Players.ClassicChat and Players.BubbleChat) then
	print("Classic and Bubble chat are enabled!")
elseif (Players.ClassicChat) then
	print("Classic chat is enabled!")
elseif (Players.BubbleChat) then
	print("Bubble chat is enabled!")
end

@roblox/globaltype/Players.GetPlayers/pa.documentation: Un servicio de juegos que contienePlayer objetos conectados actualmente.

@roblox/globaltype/Players.GetPlayers/re.documentation: A table containing all the players in the server.

@roblox/globaltype/Players.GetPlayers.documentation: Devuelve una tabla de todos los objetos Player actualmente conectados.
@roblox/globaltype/Players.GetPlayers.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function onCharacterAdded(character)
	-- Give them sparkles on their head if they don't have them yet
	if not character:FindFirstChild("Sparkles") then
		local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles")
		sparkles.Parent = character:WaitForChild("Head")
	end
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- Check if they already spawned in
	if player.Character then
		onCharacterAdded(player.Character)
	end
	-- Listen for the player (re)spawning 
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(onCharacterAdded)
end

-- Iterate over each player already connected
-- to the game using a generic for-loop
for i, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	onPlayerAdded(player)
end
-- Listen for newly connected players
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.SetSetting.code_sample:
local runBeforeKey = "RunBefore"
local hasRunBefore = plugin:GetSetting(runBeforeKey)

	print("Welcome back!")
else
	print("Welcome! Thanks for installing this plugin!")

end

@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.CreateDockWidg.documentation:
Un identificador único y coherente que se utiliza para almacenar el dock del widget
detalles del estado y otros detalles internos.
Describe la DockWidgetPluginGUI que se va a crear (estado inicial, tamaño, etc.).
Crea un DockWidgetPluginGui dado un Información de la GUI del complemento de tipo de datos/DockWidget.
@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.CreateDockWidg.code_sample:
-- Create new 'DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo' object
local widgetInfo = DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.new(
	Enum.InitialDockState.Float,  -- Widget will be initialized in floating panel
	true,   -- Widget will be initially enabled
	false,  -- Don't override the previous enabled state
	200,    -- Default width of the floating window
	300,    -- Default height of the floating window
	150,    -- Minimum width of the floating window (optional)
	150     -- Minimum height of the floating window (optional)
)

-- Create new widget GUI
local testWidget = plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGui("TestWidget", widgetInfo)

local testButton = Instance.new("TextButton")
testButton.BorderSizePixel = 0
testButton.TextSize = 20
testButton.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1,0.2,0.4)
testButton.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5,0.5)
testButton.Size = UDim2.new(1,0,1,0)
testButton.Position = UDim2.new(0.5,0,0.5,0)
testButton.SizeConstraint = Enum.SizeConstraint.RelativeYY
testButton.Text = "Click Me"
testButton.Parent = testWidget

@roblox/globaltype/PluginGui.GetRelative.documentation: The screen position of the mouse relative to the PluginGui in pixels.
Devuelve elposition del ratón en relación con elPluginGui.
@roblox/globaltype/PluginGui.GetRelative.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local widgetInfo = DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.new(
	Enum.InitialDockState.Float,
	true, false, -- Enabled state, override
	200, 300,    -- Size
	150, 150     -- Minimum size
)

local testWidget = plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGui("TestWidget", widgetInfo)

function update()
	local v2 = testWidget:GetRelativeMousePosition()
	testWidget.Title = ("(%d, %d)"):format(v2.x, v2.y)
end
RunService.Stepped:connect(update)
update()

@roblox/globaltype/PluginGui.WindowFocus.code_sample:
local dwpgi = DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.new(
	Enum.InitialDockState.Float,
	true, true, 200, 50, 1, 1
)

local widget = plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGui("TestWidget", dwpgi)

widget.WindowFocusReleased:Connect(function (...)
	widget.Title = "I'm not in focus :("

Must be a unique string that identifies this PluginAction from others

Creates a temporary action that is hidden from Studio's customize shortcuts window
  • This function creates a temporary action that is hidden from Studio's customize shortcuts window.

See also

  • articles/Intro to Plugins, an introductory article to plugin use and development
  • PluginAction, an object that represents a generic performable action in Roblox Studio, with no directly associated Toolbar or Button.
  • Plugin:CreatePluginAction, creates a PluginAction
  • PluginMenu.Title, the text to be displayed when used as a sub menu
  • PluginMenu.Icon, the icon to be displayed when used as a sub menu
  • PluginMenu:AddAction, adds the given action to the menu
  • PluginMenu:AddMenu, adds the given menu as a separator
  • PluginMenu:AddSeparator, adds a separator between items in the menu
  • PluginMenu:Clear, clears the menu
  • PluginMenu:ShowAsync, shows the menu at the mouse cursor. Yields until either an item is selected or the menu is closed. The selected action fires its Triggered event

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.documentation: A Pose holds the CFrame applied to the Motor6D connected to its associated BasePart. The part which is controlled depends on the name of the Pose.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.CFrame.documentation: The CFrame that will be applied to the Motor6D corresponding with the Pose. This CFrame is applied by changing the Motor6D\Transform property of the motor.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.AddSubPose/param.documentation: A Pose holds the CFrame applied to the Motor6D connected to its associated BasePart. The part which is controlled depends on the name of the Pose.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.AddSubPose.documentation: This function adds a sub Pose to the Pose by parenting it to it.
@roblox/globaltype/Pose.AddSubPose.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)

local pose = Instance.new("Pose")
pose.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out
local pose2 = Instance.new("Pose")
pose2.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose2.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

keyframe:RemovePose(pose) -- pose.Parent = nil 

wait(2)

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

pose:AddSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = pose

wait(2)

pose:RemoveSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = nil

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.GetSubPoses/para.documentation: A Pose holds the CFrame applied to the Motor6D connected to its associated BasePart. The part which is controlled depends on the name of the Pose.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.GetSubPoses.documentation: This function returns an array containing all sub Poses that have been added to a Pose.
@roblox/globaltype/Pose.GetSubPoses.code_sample:
local function resetPoses(parent)
    	-- both functions are equivalent to GetChildren
    	local poses = parent:IsA("Keyframe") and parent:GetPoses() 
    		or parent:IsA("Pose") and parent:GetSubPoses()
    
    	for _, pose in pairs(poses) do 
    		if pose:IsA("Pose") then
    			pose.CFrame = CFrame.new()
    			-- recurse
    			resetPoses(pose)
    		end
    	end
    end

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.RemoveSubPose/pa.documentation: A Pose holds the CFrame applied to the Motor6D connected to its associated BasePart. The part which is controlled depends on the name of the Pose.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.RemoveSubPose.documentation: This function removes a sub Pose from the Pose by parenting it to nil.
@roblox/globaltype/Pose.RemoveSubPose.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)

local pose = Instance.new("Pose")
pose.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out
local pose2 = Instance.new("Pose")
pose2.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose2.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

keyframe:RemovePose(pose) -- pose.Parent = nil 

wait(2)

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

pose:AddSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = pose

wait(2)

pose:RemoveSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = nil

@roblox/globaltype/ProximityPrompt.Trigg.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local playersHealing = {}

RunService.Stepped:Connect(function(currentTime, deltaTime)
	for player, v in pairs(playersHealing) do
		local humanoid = player.Character:FindFirstChildWhichIsA("Humanoid")
		if humanoid then
			humanoid.Health = humanoid.Health + 30*deltaTime
		end
	end
end)


script.Parent.Triggered:connect(function(player)
	playersHealing[player] = true
end)

script.Parent.TriggerEnded:connect(function(player)
	playersHealing[player] = nil
end)

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.Origin Ori.documentation: Editor-only property used to rotate the object around its pivot. Scripts must use PVInstance:PivotTo instead.

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.Origin Pos.documentation: Editor-only property used to move the object. Scripts must use PVInstance:PivotTo instead.

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.Pivot Offs.documentation: Editor-only property to set the orientation of the pivot relative to a part. Scripts must use BasePart.PivotOffset instead.
Editor-only property to set the position of the pivot relative to a part. Scripts must use BasePart.PivotOffset instead.

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.GetPivot/p.documentation: Abstract class for all objects that have a physical location in the world, specifically BasePart and Model.

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.GetPivot.code_sample:
-- This code should be placed in a LocalScript under StarterPlayerScripts
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ContextActionService = game:GetService("ContextActionService")

local function doTeleport()
	local player = Players.LocalPlayer
	local character = player.Character
	if character and character.Parent then
		-- Move the character 10 studs forwards in the direction they're facing
		local currentPivot = character:GetPivot()
		character:PivotTo(currentPivot * CFrame.new(0, 0, -10))
	end
end

ContextActionService:BindAction("Teleport", doTeleport, true, Enum.KeyCode.F)

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.PivotTo/pa.documentation: Abstract class for all objects that have a physical location in the world, specifically BasePart and Model.
The datatype.CFrame that the PVInstance pivot should equal after moving it.

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.PivotTo.documentation: Transforms the PVInstance along with all of its descendant PVInstance such that the pivot is now located at the specified datatype.CFrame.
@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.PivotTo.code_sample:
-- This code should be placed in a LocalScript under StarterPlayerScripts
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ContextActionService = game:GetService("ContextActionService")

local function doTeleport()
	local player = Players.LocalPlayer
	local character = player.Character
	if character and character.Parent then
		-- Move the character 10 studs forwards in the direction they're facing
		local currentPivot = character:GetPivot()
		character:PivotTo(currentPivot * CFrame.new(0, 0, -10))
	end
end

ContextActionService:BindAction("Teleport", doTeleport, true, Enum.KeyCode.F)

@roblox/globaltype/RayValue.documentation: A container object for a single Ray.
@roblox/globaltype/RayValue.code_sample:
local partA = workspace.PartA
local partB = workspace.PartB

-- Construct the Ray object
local origin = partA.Position
local direction = partB.Position - partA.Position
local ray = Ray.new(origin, direction)

-- Construct a RayValue to hold our new Ray
local rayValue = Instance.new("RayValue")
rayValue.Value = ray
rayValue.Name = "PartA-to-PartB Ray"
rayValue.Parent = workspace

-- Raycast to find any parts in between PartA and PartB
local part = workspace:FindPartOnRay(ray)
if part then
	print("Hit part: " .. part:GetFullName())
else
	-- This ought to never happen, as our ray starts at PartA
	-- and points towards PartB, so we should always hit PartB
	-- or some other part.
	print("No part hit!")
end

@roblox/globaltype/RayValue.Changed.Conn.documentation: Objeto que ejecuta funciones conectadas en una incidencia específica.

@roblox/globaltype/RayValue.Changed.code_sample:
local value = Instance.new("RayValue")
value.Parent = game.Workspace

value.Changed:Connect(function(NewValue)
    print(NewValue)
end)

local start = Vector3.new(0,0,0)
local lookAt = Vector3.new(10,10,10)
local ray = Ray.new(start, (lookAt - start).unit)

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.documentation: Similar to BindableEvent, but allows crossing the client/server boundary.
@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.code_sample:
-- LocalScript
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local createPartEvent = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("CreatePartEvent")
 
createPartEvent:FireServer(BrickColor.Green(), Vector3.new(10, 20, 0))


-- ========================================


-- Script
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local createPartEvent = Instance.new("RemoteEvent", ReplicatedStorage)
createPartEvent.Name = "CreatePartEvent"
 
local function onCreatePartFired(player, color, position)
	print(player.Name, "wants to create a part")
	local newPart = Instance.new("Part")
	newPart.BrickColor = color
	newPart.Position = position
	newPart.Parent = game.Workspace
end
 
createPartEvent.OnServerEvent:Connect(onCreatePartFired)

@roblox/globaltype/ReplicatedFirst.documentation: A container whose contents are replicated to all clients (but not back to the server) first before anything else.
@roblox/globaltype/ReplicatedFirst.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedFirst = game:GetService("ReplicatedFirst")

local player = Players.LocalPlayer 
local playerGui = player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

-- Create a basic loading screen
local screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
screenGui.IgnoreGuiInset = true
local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
textLabel.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0, 20, 40)
textLabel.Font = Enum.Font.GothamSemibold
textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0.8, 0.8, 0.8)
textLabel.Text = "Loading"
textLabel.TextSize = 28
textLabel.Parent = screenGui
-- Parent entire screen GUI to player GUI
screenGui.Parent = playerGui

-- Remove the default loading screen
ReplicatedFirst:RemoveDefaultLoadingScreen()

--wait(3)  -- Optionally force screen to appear for a minimum number of seconds
if not game:IsLoaded() then
	game.Loaded:Wait()
end
screenGui:Destroy()

@roblox/globaltype/RunService.documentation: Game service responsible for all run-time activity and progression of time
@roblox/globaltype/RunService.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local PART_START_POS = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local PART_SPEED = Vector3.new(10, 0, 0)

-- Create a Part with a BodyPosition
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.CFrame = CFrame.new(PART_START_POS)
local bp = Instance.new("BodyPosition")
bp.Parent = part
bp.Position = PART_START_POS
part.Parent = workspace

local function onStep(currentTime, deltaTime)
	-- Move the part the distance it is meant to move
	-- in the last `deltaTime` seconds
	bp.Position = bp.Position + PART_SPEED * deltaTime
	
	-- Here's the math behind this:
	-- speed = displacement / time
	-- displacement = speed * time
end

RunService.Stepped:Connect(onStep)

@roblox/globaltype/RunService.BindToRend.documentation: Game service responsible for all run-time activity and progression of time
The name parameter is a label for the binding, and can be used with RunService.Unbind if the binding is no longer needed

The priority of the binding is an integer, and determines when during the render step to call the custom function. The lower this number, the sooner the custom function will be called. If two bindings have the same priority the Roblox engine will randomly pick one to run first. The default Roblox control scripts run with these specific priorities: - Player Input: 100 - Camera Controls: 200 For convenience, the '''RenderPriority''' enum can be used to determine the integer value to set a binding. For example, to make a binding right before the default camera update, simply subtract 1 from the camera priority level.
Given a string name of a function and a priority, this method binds the function to RunService.RenderStepped

if RunService:IsRunMode() then
	print("Running in Studio")

if RunService:IsClient() then
	print("I am a client")
else
	print("I am not a client")
end

if RunService:IsServer() then
	print("I am a server")
else
	print("I am not a server")
end

if RunService:IsRunning() then
	print("The game is running")
else
	print("The game is stopped or paused")
end

if RunService:IsServer() then
	print("I am a server")
else
	print("I am not a server")
end

if RunService:IsRunning() then
	print("The game is running")
else
	print("The game is stopped or paused")
end
